resources.string: Network not Available ! Please connect to Internet
Rich Moore (story), Phil Johnston (story), Jim Reardon (story), Phil Johnston (screenplay), Jennifer Lee (screenplay), John C. Reilly (additional story material)
John C. Reilly, Sarah Silverman, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch

"WreckIt Ralph longs to be as beloved as his game's perfect Good Guy, FixIt Felix. Problem is, nobody loves a Bad Guy. But they do love heroes so when a modern, firstperson shooter game arrives featuring toughasnails Sergeant Calhoun, Ralph sees it as his ticket to heroism and happiness. He sneaks into the game with a simple plan win a medal but soon wrecks everything, and accidentally unleashes a deadly enemy that threatens every game in the arcade. Ralph's only hope? Vanellope von Schweetz, a young troublemaking \"glitch\" from a candy-coated cart racing game who might just be the one to teach Ralph what it means to be a Good Guy. But will he realize he is good enough to become a hero before it's \"Game Over\" for the entire arcade?"
